Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Morgan
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine: due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine, due to street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at 92nd/Ewing
ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, 91st, Harbor Drive, South Chicago, 95th, and Ewing due to street blockage near 92nd/Ewing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ewing, 91st, Harbor Drive, South Chicago, 95th, and Ewing due to street blockage near 92nd/Ewing.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Pulaski
ShortDescription: Blue  Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue  Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following earlier unauthorized person on tracks near Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier unauthorized person on tracks near Pulaski.


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
